name: mydesk
0:
”Alexa, ask my desk to raise”
”Alexa, ask my desk to lower”
”Alexa, ask my desk to set default standing height”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my desk
des:
News, you can now interact with my Desk By voice, To get started, click the “enable” button above and then sign in with your loctek account to link to your adjustable desk. You can create your loctek account in the Loctek App. 

With the skill, you can raise/lower your desk, set a default standing/sitting height, In addition, you can ask Alexa to remind you to stand up/sit down after a period of time. You can also ask Alexa how long you have standing/sitting/sporting today. Those are some example utterance.

Raise/lower desk:
(1) "Alexa, ask my desk to raise to 42 inches"
(2) "Alexa, ask my desk to lower to 31 inches"

If you have set default standing /sitting height, you can raise/lower desk to default height by saying:
(1) "Alexa, ask my desk to raise"
(2) "Alexa, ask my desk to lower"

Set default standing/sitting height
If you want to set a default standing/sitting height, you can say:
(1) "Alexa, ask my desk to set a default standing height to forty two inches"
(2) "Alexa, ask my desk to set my default sitting height to thirty inches"

Get standing/sitting/moving time
(1) "Alexa, ask my desk how long I have been standing today"
(2) "Alexa, ask my desk tell me the time I have been sitting today"
(3) "Alexa, ask my desk for moving time"
(4) "Alexa, ask my desk how much time I have been standing today"


Set a remind of standing/sitting
(1) "Alexa, ask my desk to remind me to stand up in 20 minutes"
(2) "Alexa, ask my desk to inform me to sit down 20 minutes later"
